titleStmt.title: Humane life: or, A second part of the enquiry after happiness. By the author of Practical Christianity
Enquiry after happiness. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Lucas, Richard, 1648-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for George Pawlet at the Bible in Chancery-Lane, and Samuel Smith at the Prince's Arms in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Author of Practical Christianity = Richard Lucas.
Running title reads: Of the true notion of humane life.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
